articles.content:
A bookbinder has removed JK Rowling's name from Harry Potter novels amid the furore over the author's alleged 'transphobia' - and replaced them with new covers, which are sold for £140 each.

articles.description: There were heroes aplenty – Jennifer Coolidge, Colin Farrell and Jamie Lee Curtis among them – but only one villain at this year’s star-studded Globes award ceremony
